body: dubbo2.6.X已经合并了当当网的分支是吧？那么dubbo2.5.3以前版本并不兼容dubbo2.6.X（即合并dubbox后的版本）吧？
404表示DispatcherServlet找不到HandlerMethod，其实跟dubbo本身没有关系。我觉得你应该先确定下没有dubbo的情况下请求路径是否可以被访问。
之前也尝试过这样的需求，感觉意义不大
I agree this. Sometimes I forget `implements Serializable`. I get `TimeoutException` it confused for me.
It`s bug

You are right, I will confirm this question again.
I am updating this component, complete 75% now. @lovepoem

yes
2.6.x  contains all features 2.5.x

my problems are resolved 

if your services in docker

/dubbo-monitor-simple/src/main/resources/METAINF/dubbo/internal/com.alibaba.dubbo.container.Container 

Edit to 
jetty-monitor=com.alibaba.dubbo.monitor.simple.container.JettyContainer

and find dubbo.properties edit to 
 
dubbo.container=log4j,spring,registry,jetty-monitor

Agree to change the default transporter to netty4. 

Only one thing to note: this change is not transparent to the user, they should guarantee `[netty 4](https://github.com/netty/netty)` in the classpath, which is not always satisfied since their projects may rely on netty3 by default. But I think it's ok, a release note for incompatible upgrade is enough.

To continue use `netty`, how about this way:

based on your PR, add the following items,
For [netty4/Transporter](https://github.com/apache/incubator-dubbo/blob/master/dubbo-remoting/dubbo-remoting-netty4/src/main/resources/META-INF/dubbo/internal/org.apache.dubbo.remoting.Transporter)
```properties
netty=org.apache.dubbo.remoting.transport.netty4.NettyTransporter
netty4=org.apache.dubbo.remoting.transport.netty4.NettyTransporter
```

And 

For [netty3/Transporter](https://github.com/apache/incubator-dubbo/blob/master/dubbo-remoting/dubbo-remoting-netty/src/main/resources/META-INF/dubbo/internal/org.apache.dubbo.remoting.Transporter)
```properties
netty3=org.apache.dubbo.remoting.transport.netty.NettyTransporter
```

Perhaps the `server` should be removed and passed to the client.
@zonghaishang Agree to remove `server` from the client, and this can be achieved within this issue #2030

Hi @playaround88 ,

Great job.
Would you please an email to dev@dubbo.apache.org to notify the community of this extension? We can discuss whether to remove this extension to the [ecosystem](https://github.com/dubbo), you can see some serialization already hosted there.

@diecui1202 
Sorry, I do not understand your meaning.
1. dubbo now is under apache/incubator-dubbo, and I fork from here.
2. this RP is as you say commit as a seperate project named dubbo-serialization-avro.
3. I can find dubbo project at github.com/dubbo, which project should I work on?

first time to post RP, and I have found some bad ops on PR(this RP is on my master branch).

thanks and please show me more detail!
I think it should go another way around, that is, change log level to `warn`.
this is a known issue, I will fix it soon.

@AllenBlock Please forget about the embedded `json` serialization, it has been deprecated and turned out to have some bugs.

recommend use the other serializations, fastjson, hessian, kryo, etc.
Reopen if necessary.

@diecui1202 @chickenlj @kimmking 
hi all,
I have move the RP to an seperate project. and I will resend to mail-list to notify the community.
addressed here: https://github.com/playaround88/dubbo-serialization-avro
cool~

I don't know why you want to try different serialID, which you mentioned from 0-31. 

> 因为心跳包不设计逻辑处理，不需要获取serialID对应的实例，这里检查这个字段有什么意义呢？因为这个原因就导致服务端抛出异常，个人觉得这个处理欠妥。

But this part you mentioned is quite reasonable, if a heartbeat event doesn't have any payload, we don't have to deserialize anymore.
Be aware that Dubbo itself mixed `read-only` and `heartbeat` event handling internally.

For case 2, I am afraid there are no perfect solutions, when a heuristic exception occur, you can only retry or check offline.

For case 1, I think it's meaningful to notify the hanging client requests as soon as possible. When Server goes down it will trigger `disconnect` on Client, and we can then return all requests related to this channel.

As far as I know, some users rely on Registry group to isolate clusters belongs to the different business area.

So instead of deleting this feature, we may need to further enhance it, supplement docs, enhance functionality.
